title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2133/95 of 7 September 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 drawing up a list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2133/95 of 7 September 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No  1517/77 drawing up a list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 is hereby replaced by the  Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 September 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
>TABLE>
